emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

We noticed a login to your {APP_NAME} account from a new location:

{ALERT_INFO}

If this wasn't you, you should immediately change your {APP_NAME} account password to revoke access from all other locations.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

Your one-time password is: {OTP}

If you didn't ask for the one-time password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

Thank you for joining us at {APP_NAME}.

Click on the button below to verify your email address.

Verify

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to reset your password.

Reset password

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

name: _authOrigins
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_authOrigins_unique_pairs` ON `_authOrigins` (collectionRef, recordRef, fingerprint)

name: _externalAuths
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_record_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, recordRef, provider)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_collection_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, provider, providerId)

name: anime
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_anilist_media_id ON anime (anilist_media_id)

name: anime_proposal
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_proposal_status ON anime_proposal (fk_to_user_id, status)

name: anime_shared_list
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_anime_list ON anime_shared_list (fk_anime_id, fk_shared_list_id)

name: audit_log
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_logs_ref ON audit_log (record_id, created)

name: shared_list
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_list_privacy ON shared_list (privacy_level, fk_owner_user_id)

name: user_shared_list
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_user_list ON user_shared_list (fk_user_id, fk_shared_list_id)
